extendedInfo.description: Brick Break Game with a fresh new feeling!Not only the traditional stages of brick break games, but also stages to scroll vertically or horizontally are available.In addition, three-dimensional stages with height difference, bring you a new game experience!Some stages are very tough, and you must challenge them!If you are good at breaking bricks, come on and try to clear all the stages!Also, there is a story behind the battles in this minimum space.It would be a pleasure to find out the ending.Come on and try your best to find out it!â»This story is a fiction, the names of the group/persons that appears are all fictitious.â»Please refrain from unauthorized copying or unauthorized distribution of this software.â»Terms of useThe creators of this game are not responsible for any loss or damage as a result of use of this software.Please use it at your own risk.GAME TITLE: ACTIVE SPACEBrick Breaker(Brick Break Game, Breakout)BGM: 2dgames.jp, senses circuit, amachamusicSE: affexceed arts, pocket soundGame engine: e3roidMap tool: tiledtag: Brick Break, Brick Breaker, Breakout, Games of Android, the latest games, popular games,free games, Featured games, essential, new game, Arkanoid, ACTIVE SPACE
